name: Zen Block Puzzle Landscape
description:
ZEN BLOCK PUZZLE LANSCAPE is the new beautiful relaxing block. It can help you keep your mind active and pass your free time.
If you’re looking for a classic block puzzle game to relax, ZEN BLOCK PUZZLE LANSCAPE is right up your alley. This is one of the most unique puzzle games with the beauty of nature.
The objective of this game is simple – drag the blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. The more block formations you make, the more scores you will be granted.
ZEN BLOCK LANSCAPE Features:
-Beautiful wood background & effects
-No time limit & no pressure.
-Simple & Fun
-Relaxing & Addictive
